summary: Applied pixel-accurate Figma hero styling: 1444px container with 20px padding, 600px min height, 64px gap, 64px headline at 1.2 line-height, 617px pill search (56px tall, 13/16px padding) with search icon image-4.png, hero visual sized/positioned to Figma (727x465 frame, 274px blurred accent at 50/152, main 487x465 at -101/134).
